product_name: Werner Skagit CF IM Kayak Paddle
long_description: The Werner Skagit CF IM kayak paddle offers a smooth stroke, lightweight materials, great looks and unbeatable value. Top-quality carbon-fiber shaft creates a durable, lightweight and well-balanced paddle. Adjustable Ferrule System allows elegant adjustment of feathering angle from 0deg - 60deg right or left in 15deg increments. Improved ferrule design incorporates internal printing of offset degrees and a low-profile button release that makes paddle feel like 1 piece. Carbon-reinforced nylon blades provide high durability with minimal weight. Asymmetrical blade shape helps reduce torque, allowing paddle to pull smoothly through the water and reducing the need to grip tightly. Light swing weight reduces overall fatigue on long paddling excursions. Drip rings help keep hands and lap dry. Design is optimized for low-angle paddling style. 2-piece design breaks down quickly and eases transport and storage.
short_description: The Werner Skagit CF IM kayak paddle offers a smooth stroke, lightweight materials, great looks and unbeatable value.
